kv15.10:1.3_0: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa alobho kusalamūlaṁ, adoso kusalamūlaṁ, amoho kusalamūlaṁ, saddhā vīriyaṁ sati samādhi paññāti?
kv15.10:1.5_0: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa alobho kusalamūlaṁ, adoso kusalamūlaṁ …pe… paññāti?
kv15.10:1.7_0: Hañci natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa alobho kusalamūlaṁ, adoso kusalamūlaṁ, amoho kusalamūlaṁ, saddhā vīriyaṁ sati samādhi paññā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.10:2.3_0: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.10:2.5_0: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.10:2.12_0: sacittakassa maggabhāvanā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.10:3.3_0: Ye keci saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjanti, sabbe te asaññasattupikāti?
kv15.10:4.6_0: Hañci idhāpi asaññī tatrāpi asaññī, tena vata re vattabbe—
